ygData.subject: Re: Somebody PLEASE tell me I'm wrong
ygData.msgSnippet: On the monk message board we are trying to get as many individuals as possible to come and post about the nerf done to FD and how it hurts not only monks but
ygData.messageBody:
On the monk message board we are trying to get as many individuals as
possible to come and post about the nerf done to FD and how it hurts not
only monks but the Everquest Community in general. pleas ecome to this board
and show your support.

http://server3.ezboard.com/feverquestmonksfeigndeathnerf.showMessage?topicID
=24.topic



Kizmet Bayashi
Level 45 monk of E-Marr
Da`Kor
----- Original Message -----
From: Red Eyes <puckhoog@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 12:55 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Somebody PLEASE tell me I'm wrong


> From: "Red Eyes" <puckhoog@...>
>
> This is a very shitty thing for them to do. But here is what we must do.
We
> all have to band together and Feedback the hell out of them. I mean if a
Mob
> goes all the way back to its resting place but then can come after us and
> kill us what kind of BS is that. Besides from 300 yards away behind walls
> and door and deep below where we feigned death how would anything let
alone
> a mob know that we got up. Very suspect if you ask me. So all of us need
to
> Feedback the hell out of varent. If you don't think it will work all I
have
> to say is look back to when they nerfed the Box of Abu Kar.
>
> Heldenfeld
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Lance Cummins <landrewc@...>
> To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 12:42 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Somebody PLEASE tell me I'm wrong
>
>
> > From: Lance Cummins <landrewc@...>
> >
> > You are not wrong. I died in Unrest last night. I
> > feigned then got up after a while my buds said the
> > zone was clear. We got back to work and about 5 mins
> > later the ghouls and a hag came screaming out of the
> > house looking for Monk blood. I really feel like
> > Verant bent us over on this one!
> >
> > Dshai
> > 22 Monk
> > Cazic Thule
> >
> >
> >
> > =====
> > I did'nt fight my way to the top of the food chain to be a vegeterian.
> >
> > >
>
